description:
This Course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Update: 29 Oct 2015; A Student, Shawn, has alerted me to the fact that Udemy now expects you to have 500 unique visitors to your website, daily and unless you confirm this is the case, you will not be able to sign up as an Affiliate! Please check this out before buying this course.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Are you looking to earn a few hundred extra dollars a month? Do you want to have a home based business? Do you want an extra income stream on the side or to earn some money part time?

This Course will show you EXACTLY how I run my Udemy Affiliate Marketing business. It is a step by step course showing you the processes and systems I have used to develop my own Udemy Affiliate income.

What Our Students say about "Udemy Affiliate Marketing"

Shawn Casey "I liked his plan of researching information and getting affiliate marketing campaigns"

Mike Fishbein "The production quality is strong and John seems to really know his stuff"

Paul Jenkins "Let's be clear - when anyone running an online business lets you right inside their method, processes and case studies you need to pay VERY close attention"

Denise Fletcher "In addition to this John is generous with his additional material - I will definitely be using this course as a "go back to " resource. This course is professional, good quality and detailed."

Ilias Diamantis "This is literally a turn key business . John Colley gives us the process , the systems and the templates he uses to become a successful Udemy affiliate"

Joe Parys "I was always curious about affiliate marketing and I am now using this course to earn more passive income. Worth its weight in gold"

Affiliate Marketing is a great way to make money, passively but you really need to understand how it works from the ground up. With this course I share how to:

  1. Set up an Udemy Affiliate Account in Linkshare
  2. Set up one or more Twitter accounts
  3. Find Courses and Discount Coupons to Promote
  4. Create Promotional Campaigns you can re-promote effortlessly
  5. Sign up to Hootsuite (free version)
  6. Start Affiliate Marketing Udemy Courses

    The Benefits of Taking This Course

    • Fast track yourself to a money earning Udemy Affiliate Marketing business for little or no cost
    • Discover how easy it is to set up the six simple steps you need to be up and running in no time
    • Discover how to identify the best instructors and courses to promote - I provide you with spreadsheets of the most successful instructors and best selling courses
    • Know how to develop key relationships with those instructors to get exclusive
    • Gain exclusive access to my Visokio Omniscope (data visualisation software) dataset for free to do your own advanced analysis, if you choose to do so
    • Discover my automated system for day to day management of your Udemy Affiliate Marketing business that you can do in 15 minutes a day
    • Learn how to apply that system to affiliate marketing in Social Media

I Want You to Be Successful

I very much enjoy hearing from my students and I welcome you reaching out to me with questions, discussions and private messages. I always do my best to answer questions as soon as I see them. I love helping you and I am passionately committed to your success.

No Risk - No Quibble Money Back Guarantee

Udemy provides a 100% 30 day money back guarantee which I fully endorse. You can take this course today and if it does not deliver for you - get a complete refund. This is more than just a guarantee, this is my commitment to your success....which is why I have thousands of Udemy students in my courses.

What You Should Do NOW!

Enrol in this Course Now, before you miss the opportunity and discover how easy it is to increase your income through Affiliate Marketing of Udemy Courses. Enrol today!

Affiliate Marketing Course Tags: How to make money online, Affiliate Marketing Network, Affiliate Marketing Program, Rakuten LinkShare, Make Passive Income, Udemy Affiliate Program, Work form home, Earn Money.
title: Affiliate Marketing for Udemy Instructors - Unofficial
